llm_res.rule: totalSupply: Returns the total token supply.
llm_res.violation: The totalSupply function adds an arbitrary value of 320 to the total supply, which is not compliant with the standard.

llm_res.rule: allowance: Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
llm_res.violation: The allowance function adds an arbitrary value of 921 to the allowance, which is not compliant with the standard.
